description: 2 guys in a red car on the road, one guy is looking at a map
text:
Alex: I think we're lost.
Ben: Don't worry, I'm sure we'll find our way.

**

description: The car is out of gas in front of a gas station, the 2 guys are outside the car
text:
Alex: We're out of gas.
Ben: Great, now what are we going to do?

**

description: The car is on the side of the road, the 2 guys are changing a flat tire
text:
Alex: I can't believe we got a flat tire.
Ben: Don't worry, I've changed a tire before.

**

description: The 2 guys are driving in the car again, they are laughing
text:
Alex: Well, that was an adventure.
Ben: Yeah, but we made it through together.

**

description: The 2 guys are at the music festival, they are dancing and having fun
text:
Alex: This is the best day ever!
Ben: I know, I'm so glad we went on this road trip.

**

description: the 2 guys are driving back home, they are tired but happy
text:
Alex: I don't want this day to end.
Ben: Me neither, but I think we need some sleep.
